branchCategory.name: M(D)B1K-Z, Square Tube, Non-rotating, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchCategory.description: The MB series is a light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. The MB series is available with many standard options, which include stroke adjustment, tandem, high/low temperature seals, heavy rod scraper, non-rotating rod, double rod and many more.
